values: so.. my iPod ISN'T dead. i almost cried when i thought it was. and then when it started working, i almost cried again.. tears of immense joy. heh, i'm such a loser. Ami will agree with that statement :P so, yes. i am switching lj's. i've just spent the past couple hours making it pretty and stuff. so i think i'm ready to make the transition. i shall miss this username. i guess? i dunno. i'm tired of it. i've had it since FEBRUARY! *gasp* a grand total of around 10 months! a bit less, but.. whatever. and i'm not on my Sex Pistols kick anymore ["Pretty Vacant" is the title of my favorite Sex Pistols song, for those who didn't know], and i haven't been for a while. see, that's why you shouldn't make usernames from like, song titles and stuff. oh well.. i do it all the time. so moving on to my 4th lj username lol.. 'tis ..yeah, a little weird but whatever. kind of original, right? more original than my others, i suppose. pirates rock. i made a hot pirate on Halloween. and if you like The Princess Bride then [i'm assuming] you'll get the new name. heh, it makes me laugh :) yes, so.. add to yo' friends list, bitches! latersss

my iPod is being ..stupid!
actually i think it died x_x
and i think i'm going to die without it.
i am so asking for a new one for Christmas.
i prolly have a better chance of getting it for my birthday, but Christmas is in a little less than 2 months, and my birthday is a little less than 3. yeah, sooner is better lol.

ok, what the fuck? PEOPLE NEED TO GROW UP AND TELL THE TRUTH! i don't know what to believe. and as far as i know, it doesn't involve me. and i don't want to not be friends with someone just because my other friend is mad at that someone. even though i'm angry at that someone too for [supposedly] saying shit about my friend. so, i don't know what's going on. 



HALLOWEEN ROCKED HARDCORE!! 

and i might be switching to a new username soon, but i dunno. i shall let you all know if i do. 


hooray, time to go to school.

ok so.. i'm over it. i guess? just not as upset today as i was the other day. i guess i just had to fully realize and understand that it's never gonna happen. -no, this is not some stupid shit over some stupid boy.- today at the museum was a complete waste of time lol. but it was still fun because Ami and Kelly rock. they crack me up :D and Ryan will be there tomorrow *woot* i can't wait for Friday [Palace show], then Saturday [Lake Compounce], then Monday night [yyeaaahh! first time Trick-or-Treating since flipping 7th grade lol]. yeah, ok i'm FREEZING. i'm going in my room where my heater is. AAHH! i almost forgot. flipping SCARE BEARS are BREAKING UP!! yeah i totally died a little inside when i heard that. *cries*

i hate feeling this way.

but what i hate even more is that i don't feel like there's anyone i can talk to about it who i would feel comfortable knowing about it, and/or who wouldn't judge me. 

i can't even post it [publically] in here, because i would be asked a million questions. a million awkward questions that i couldn't answer without crying and without feeling judged. 











good night



</3

yeah you know that's cute as hell. the artist who did that is amazing.. Jeff Thomas. *woot* he rocks. anyways, i made that for a userpic on here but it's too big :( oh well. it's still cute. Ami i hope you feel better!! <3

yeah biatch.. be jealous: http://www.motorola.com/motoinfo/product/details/0,,72,00.html
that's the phone my dad gave me yesterday. i HEART it. he and Tara got new phones too. but Tara doesn't know it yet cuz her's is a birthday present. but since all three of our phones were eligible for upgrades, my dad just got all 3 at the same time and let me have mine yesterday *woot* he was gonna wait until Christmas to give me mine, but i am oh so glad he didnt. he gave it to me yesterday cuz you only have 30 days to return it and he wanted to make sure it worked and everything. it works just fine lol i havent stopped playing with it. the only things that suck are my ringtones. i only have 2 cool ones. i want to get more because i can give everyone in my phone book their own rings lol. but i dont think i would.. only the people that call me a lot. so if you want your own ring, call me more often lol. and when people call me, if i have a picture of them it'll come up in my caller ID. so yeah, i'll be taking pictures of you lol. 

ok im going to go play with my phone some more :D
Liz got a new phone!! YESSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS!

<font size="1">no matter how many times you tell me i'm wrong, i still don't fucking believe you.</font size>





yeah, so i ended up going to the school dance instead of Emily's party. and im glad i did because i had so much FUN last night. Angela is one crazy mofo, but its always a blast hanging out with her. and she actually got me to dance after a while lol. and i realized that it doesn't really matter if i look like a fruit-tart and people think i'm weird when i dance, because if you go to a DANCE and you don't fucking DANCE, then you look like even more of a fruit-tart and people think you're weirder for just standing there. so yeah SON, i shook my ass to some Kanye West! lol and they played Fall Out Boy and "Party Like A Rockstar" and some other rockish songs that idr and it made me happy. but they only played two techno songs, and i so wish i had glowsticks!! and Angela was dancing with all the black boys XD and you know how like, someone will be dancing and everyone will notice them and make a circle around them? yeah, well they did that to Angela when she was dancing with Mike and Avery and all them, and it was so funny. they were like "YEAH, YOU GO WHITE GIRL!" it was great. and i learned how to do Cotton Eyed Joe. yeah its really easy and idk why i never knew it but yeah lol. and of course the Cha Cha Slide and the Electric Slide.. but no Chicken Dance :( but it's all good. and Ashley danced with Jensen hehe. they're so cute. aaaaaand.. oh, then after the dance we [Ashley, Angela, Kiersten, Kelsey, and i] went out to Friendly's. mmmmm fun times lol. i got home around 11:00 and i was totally dead, so i went to sleep. and now i have to go get dressed because today is my little brother's birthday party. YAY! :P

Ami, you and i rock hardcore lol. today was great. our plan this morning was to go to the museum right after school. then Angela said she was going to Louie's for pizza after school, so i was like YES let's go i'm starving. so Ami and i went with Angela and Ashley to Louie's and then we were going to go to the museum. THEN we were like, yo.. we don't even really have to be there until our usual time, around 3:30, and it's only 1:00 [we had a half day at school.. hooray for half days!] now, let's bullshit away the next couple hours lol. so we ran like crazy people all through freaking downtown Waterbury.. me looking like a dumbass with my algebra book in hand, and us getting scared that we were gonna get run over, even in the cross walks lol. every time we crossed the street Ami RAN XD and so we went to the costume shop, forgot to go to CVS, went to the CD shop, forgot to go to 7-11, and finally after we had walked around pretty much all of downtown Waterbury and got over to the museum, we decided to just fuck it and totally skip the museum because we had never even told Theresa we were definitely going today, and we went to Toys R Us. oh, but first we got ice cream from the Mr. Softee truck! hellz yeah! strawberry milkshake.. mmmmm. so we walked over to Toys R Us [down fucking steep-ass stairs lol] and hung out in there for a while, playing with all the toys and breaking the pogo stick and almost getting in trouble lol. actually, at this point, i think we were still considering going back to the museum [only to see Ryan lol], but not so much. and after Toys R Us, we really decided fuck it, and walked over to the mall. we stayed there for a while, went to Hot Topic and Spencer's and such, and A PHOTOBOOTH! oooooh yeah! lmao, and my mom called my cell while we were in the photobooth, and me being the genius that i am, i fucking answered it XD but i didn't get in trouble so it's all good. but after the mall, we had to walk back to the museum because Ami didn't want to get in trouble for skipping out on it, and.. yeah. so today was super fun, blowing off the museum and just bullshitting away the WHOLE afternoon [even though we didn't get to see Ryan, so sad!]. we were walking around from like 12:30 to 4:45 dude, it was awesome. you know you're jealous, you should be. and now mi madre is at open house. oh joy :P

ok i'm torn. well.. not really all that torn.. but yeah, anyways.

so we have this dance on friday that a few of my friends are going to and they want me to come and hang out too. it's only $5 and it sounds alright i guess. but then, today Emily invited me to her birthday party, which is on flipping FRIDAY [yeah, in 2 days!]. i don't have a gift. it's formal and i don't have a dress. and its kind of short notice and ..yeah. and idk who else is going and i dont really want to spend the night alone at her party. but Emily is cool and she seemed to really want me to go. but you'd think if she wanted me to go so bad, she would have asked me, uh, SOONER! like when she invited everyone else like a damn month ago. she was like "I wanted to invite you before but I didn't think you'd want to go." and im like, erm, ok then? at the moment i'm leaning towards the dance. cuz it's cheaper XD and its not all formal and such and yeah, its just easier. but i'd feel bad blowing off Emily's party. then again, its not as if she's like, my best friend or anything. she's nice tho. but im still leaning towards the dance. i guess we'll see though. it depends on if i can get a gift and find a dress on time and all that. 

*woot* Aimster and i get to see hot college guy Ryan tomorrow :D and spending 4.5 hours at the museum will be worth it cuz i heart my Aimster and Ryan's cool lol. 




i want to build a time machine and go back to sunday night XD

i have the coolest friends in the history of forever. i had to go over Shelley's house yesterday after school with Angela to work on our Chemistry project. took us flipping forever [like, 4.5 hours when we only expected it to take about 1.5 or 2], and we probably did it wrong XD but despite our many technical difficulties, i don't think i have ever laughed so much in such a short time before. they are both absolutely crazy, especially Angela. XD i HEART her with all of my heart. sigh.. yeah. erm.. well, i'm going to mi padre's casa today. i was supposed to go last night.. he was supposed to pick me up from Shelley's but apparently it was like a flippin monsoon up in Torrington and the roads were wicked, so Angela's mom brought me home to my mom's and now my dad's gonna pick me up today. he told me to call him when woke up. yeah, well, i've been up since just before 9:00 lol but i wanted to watch SpongeBob, and then i wanted to go online. so yeah, i'll call him in a second, when i'm done with this mess. anyways, i'm going to my dad's today only because i want to see my sister. and i need to see what the fuck is the matter with my camera! Tara JUST took it to the PhotoShop and they said it was fiiiinnneeee. but now it won't work for me again. perhaps it hates me :P hmph. Ami.. where do you like, live? lol so i can pick you up TOMORROW! *woot* i'll call you tomorrow mmkay? ♥ oh yeah, and speaking of that, hah.. apparently Angela's had her tickets for who knows how long. but her sister like, hid them for whatever reason. they came in the mail and the envelope had her mom's name on it, but her sister opened it anyway and like, flippin' hid it under this giant pile of mail and papers. yeah she's pretty mad at her sister right now. if they hadn't thought to make sure that maybe the tickets came and they just like, missed them or something.. then they could have been sitting there the whole freaking time and Angela wouldn't've known and she wouldn't've been able to go. and that would have sucked big moose balls. her sister is strange o_O Aneta.. i threw my apple away lol. i actually was going to eat it, but it was nasty XD so i threw it out. so disappointing. and did you see Domino?????? I WANT TO SEE THAT!! >_< i heart Kiera! oooooooooooooooooh!!! yesssssssss! my aunt is getting me Bare Minerals! SWEET! :D ok well i best be calling my daddy. MCR IS TOMORROW!!!!!!!!
2 more days until MCR!!
3 more days until MCR!! eeeeeeeeep! only 3 days! SO EXCITED! i hope Angela gets her tickets by saturday x_x

holy flippin' hell.. i HEART Halifax, omgosh. yeah.. they were on Real World last night, so i had to be cool and find their shit and listen to it! hah, and they rock. *woot* i am still freezing cold. i've been freezing since we walked to the museum in the RAIN! i like the rain, and i wouldn't have minded so much if it wasn't so COLD and rainy. ugh.. yeah. poor Kelly was SOAKED and so was i. and Ami was having major umbrella problems lol. crazy kids. and speaking of crazy kids. holy mother.. i had to go up to the 4th effing floor today at school [twice.. not once, twice, and both times from the 1st floor. yeah, i'm too fat for that. and even if i wasn't im pretty sure it would have still sucked balls]. and i had to take pictures of 6th and 7th graders [no offense Raul, because you are an exception and you are cool lol]. the kids in that class were freaking crazy as hell. they were doing e-pals and wanted to send pics along with their emails. so me and this girl Amanda went up to the middle school to take their pictures because we are just oh-so talented. yeah. they were SO LOUD and they were jumping all over the place and they were just so weird. wow.. some of those 6th graders make me think i never ever want kids. geez. x_x yeah i should be doing my alegbra homework. eww. and my CD burner is being a BASTARD.. ugh i'm going to go take a shower first though and use up all the hot water ::evil grin:: 4 more days until MCR!!

XD i heart Ashley and Angela. they came over today after school. cuz Angela, Shelley, and i are lab partners for chem and we have a project due next week. so the three of us planned on going to my house today to work on it, but Shelley couldn't come and we didn't want to do the work without her. hah, so Angela was upset because she said she was looking forward to coming over my house lol. so i told her to come over anyways. so she came on my bus today after school. and Ashley isn't in our group, but she's on my bus and i felt bad and she felt left out so i was like Ash, you should come over too! so she did ^_^ and we had funnnnn. and apparently Angela was being weird to Christian when i was on the phone with my dad lol. mis amigas son muy loco XD and i heart them with all of my.. heart lol. but now they are gone and it's quiet and lonely and i miss them lol it's time for them to come back!! *cry* ugh, damn family tree project in history. everyone else's is like, so fancy and so nice with all this STUFF and yeah. i didn't have to present today thank goodness. ewww i hate public speakingggg. it sucks big moose balls. and tomorrow are PSATs. get's me out of my first 4 periods lol. and gives me SAT practice, so it's all good. ^_^ 5 more days until MCR!! aaahhh.. it's so close, i can almost taste it! SO EXCITED!!

this song ["Tiny Dancer"] will forever remind me of Almost Famous .. frikin awesome movie ♥ gosh i'm FREEZING! and i like it lol. i hope it stays cold. i much prefer this weather honestly. i flippin' hate the heat. *woot* i've been designing my class ring today online. i made 2, i can't decide which i like better. and they both cost the same so i can't choose the cheapest, like i would do if i had that choice lol. i'm almost done with my freakin Family Tree. but people need to email me back!! i still need some names and such. so yeah.. i've gone as far as i can for now. hopefully my family will give me more info by tomorrow morning lol. and hopefully i don't get called on to present my shit tomorrow. CHRISTIAN! i heart you, my brother :) i know it's not the same, but i promise to be the best friend i can for you. i kno there's stuff that you just can't talk about with a girl, stuff that you and i just can't relate to with each other. but i'm always around to listen, you know that. i'm sorry you're so sad and i wish i could make it better. cuz you're like my brother, and like i told you last night, i'd totally trade you for one of my brothers [preferably Seth] if i could lol. cuz you rock at life. you deserve to be happy and i wish you were. i hope you find what you're looking for, and soon. -and when/what is this bonfire thinger that Aneta told me about?? ::evil grin:: YAY FIRE! 6 more days until MCR!!

yo.. so today was the Apple Festival. and yeah, it was way cooler in 7th grade XD i still had a good time with my Aneta though. but it was kind of lame and we couldn't decide what to eat for like, 5 days lol. and then i like, spilled my taco all over my hoodie.. ew. and there were barely any APPLES at the APPLE Festival. but we did get free apples before we left lol. but.. i don't want to eat mine. yeah. and there weren't a lot of cool booths like last time.. i like, saw nothing i wanted. which is strange because i had NO money, and usually when i have no money i see all kinds of shit that i want. but i guess it's good that i didn't. meh.. whateverrr. hmmmm.. 7 more days until MCR!!
nothing to write about at all except 8 more days until MCR!!

oops.. i just clicked the thing in iTunes to upgrade it.. and the website came up in the window i already had open and.. yeah, i just lost my whole entry. hah.. oh well, not like it was a book or anything. and now i just hit enter to space down on here.. and at the same exact moment a window popped up for the iTunes thinger. GOSH.. worst freaking timing ever. now i have to download it again. geez. ANYWAYS.. i was supposed to be going to Holy Land with Eugene and his friend tonight, but they're not leaving to go until around 10:00. and seeing as how that's when i'm supposed to be home, i'm pretty sure it's safe to assume that my mom wouldn't let me go and say out until 2am with them lol. oh well. i was kind of looking forward to it because i've never been there, but i admit that it prolly would have been soooo awkward. mmm hmm. but Eugene said that he and his friend usually go out and do other stuff first, like the mall or to a pool hall or something, so i can go with them to that. yup :D [Edit]: ok so now i'm just going to the mall and meeting Aneta there and hopefully Angela and maybe Ami and her friend Amber and hopefully Eugene lol. ....yeah and now i hear that it's supposed to RAIN THIS WEEKEND?? aarrrrrggghhh!! well, it's supposed to be just awful tomorrow but not as bad on Sunday, so we're shooting for that. which means that now Eugene can't go -growl- but is that still ok for you Aneta? it best be!! omgosh.. i saw freaking Mrs. Signori today in the hall and had a horrible flashback to 7th grade. WHAT THE FUCK IS SHE DOING AT MY SCHOOL??!! ugh.. she's part of what made my 7th grade year such HELL! i really pity the middle schoolers who have her. i really, REALLY do. you don't have her, do you Raul? is she still a major bitch? i bet she is. i'm so glad she's not teaching high school. i disliked her with a passion. and she didn't like me either. 9 more days until MCR!!

hooray for half days! but boo for stupid busses being like 15 minutes late -grr- ------------------------------- well this bites.. i lost the charger for my iPod. i don't know where the hell it could be, i swear it fell into somekind of black hole behind my bed or something. ugh. i wasn't that worried because when you update your iPod on the computer, you can leave it plugged into the computer and that charges it too. but now, being stupid, i updated my iPod software thingy and now it won't let me charge my iPod on my computer. so now i need to buy a new charger, effing $30. and i have to use my CD player now. gosh, that is like, so 20th century XD i suppose i'll live. [Edit]: YES I GOT IT TO WORK! shweetness :D [/Edit] soo.. Apple Festival this saturday. *woot* i have to pay my class dues and for PSATs, so i'll have NO money. but it's ok, it'll still be fun. and i say this all the time, but i seriously need to get my ass in gear and like, apply for JOBS! if only my internship at the Mattatuck Museum was a paid internship. that would rock, and i'd work a lot harder hah. i was going to apply at Holiday Cinemas but.. i kind of changed my mind. they still hiring at that I Can't Believe It's Yogurt? hmmm.. that is priceless and Ami, stop making fun of me for my myspace background! lol AH! last night i heard HIM's new song on the radio. they'd never played HIM before.. its about fucking time! lol but the stupid DJ apparently knows like, absolutely nothing about the band and sounded like a freaking idiot talking about the new CD. and he called the song "Pull Out a Butterfly's Wings" ..yeah, ok. close but.. not. btw, i still don't have their new CD. EW.. i hate not having moneyyyyy. 10 more days until MCR!! there are so many people i know going to that concert, it's crazy. it's gonna be a KILLER TIME! anyone else want to go? lol you should! because MCR rockssssssss!

well you shall be happy to hear that i have aquired not one but TWO, count 'em, TWO! lab partners. lol i heart Angela and Shelley :D i am dying inside without new SBP to read! and no O.C. or Reunion until effing November! damn baseball.. but GO YANKEES!! anyways lol and i am going to kill Kelly for leaving me alone in encore today. STOP BEING "SICK"! meanie.. and uhm, idk what else to say. except.. 11 more days until MCR!! is this getting obnoxious yet? too fucking bad ♥

hooray for cool kids who like cool stuff and for making new friends :D i still feel like complete crap. but despite that, today was an ok day. even though since i was absent yesterday i am without a lab partner in Chem. and i am so very, very lonely. but it's ok. usually i prefer to work alone. but.. i would at least like to be asked by one of my friends if i want to join their group. meh :/ so yeah i would have stayed home today, but me mum said that if i stayed home i'd have to go to the doctor. pssshha, yeah fuck that mess. no doctors for Liz, thanks. and like, 5 people told me how sick and miserable i looked. yeah, thanks for noticing when that's really not the kind of attention i want XD yess.. new Teen Titans in 15 minutes, bizitch! *woot* this morning was the first time i've watched it in so long. and of course i missed half of it and it was one i'd only ever seen like, the last 2 minutes of before. -grr- i heart being happy for someone other than myself. i HEART seeing my friends happy. i really, really do. ^_^ i got to talk to Alysha for about .5 nanoseconds today lol. she was on AIM on her phone and it's a bitch to try and talk on there, so she didn't stay on long. but at least i got to say hello to my Aly. i heart her. 12 more days until MCR!! yes, i'm going to do that everyday.. if i remember, that is.

my ears keep popping whenever i yawn or breathe in or swallow the wrong way. im super stuffy and i just feel so blah. and i can't take my flonase because im all stuffy and i cant breathe in thru my nose to take it! fucking hell. hmm.. and i'm hungry lol. i have been on this fucking computer for EIGHT HOURS TODAY. damn. and this is the result: took me freaking forever to get the words how i wanted them, because when it comes to icons, i am a perfectionist. oh yeah, it's from the Shoebox Project of course. because i effing heart SBP to death. meh.. and the one friend i have on here who reads SBP too is away and won't even see it! and it's all because of her i started reading SBP and i'm now obsessed with it. they really need to post something new.. SOON! argh. it's still cool though, isnt it? i love it. i miss Alysha :( yeah so.. 8 fucking hours. i still haven't done my photo homework. heh.. but i don't really need to do much to my photo journal. because i was a perfectionist with that, too. yeah. 13 more days until MCR!!

well having allergies from hell kind of paid off a little this morning. i finally finished reading all the entries so far of SBP. but who the hell knows when they're going to be able to post again. so now i have to just WAIT cuz there's nothing left to read. and i'm going to diiiieeeeeee. but it's worth it because SBP fucking rules all. *looovvvveeee*

yeah other than that, i feel like shit. and i will probably get yelled at by Ami for not being at school today. but i'll be back at school tomorrow. unless it turns into bronchitis like last time, but i doubt that very much.

:D

k well i'm off to do more procrastinating instead of homework.

right well.. my mom hadn't come home yet last night when i said in my last entry "ahh i thinks she's home" lol. yeah, i didnt want to talk to her, so i panicked and just shut off the computer and went in my room. i was up reading for about an hour and she still hadn't come home yet. i dunno what time she got home cuz i decided, fuck it.. and went to sleep. she doesn't seem all that upset anymore, just kinda cranky cuz she can't get rid of her headache. XD hah, and i think i figured out why i was so effin upset last night at ..nothing really. yeah i figured it out today during chemistry. yuuuck.. being a girl sucks sometimes.

well, i got a big hug from Mike out of it, so it's all good ^_^

dude, i seriously need a hug right now. i can't stop shaking and i was crying for 15 minutes. i don't know why i'm so upset, honestly. but i'm freaking out. and i just tried to call Allison, didn't answer.. Alysha didn't answer either. so yeah, i dunno who else to call. and i'm pretty sure that if i did call someone, i'd start crying again as soon as i started talking. so here's what happened. it's not gonna be like OMG!! aalakfjajflajflaj.. you know.. but like i said, i really don't understand why i'm so upset. anyways.. so last week, my mom is like, i signed you up for confirmation classes. i glared and whined, but really didn't protest much. i didn't want to upset her and tell her i don't want to be confirmed, because i was sure she'd ask why, and then i'd tell her and she'd fucking.. shank me. gosh. so then i actually forgot about it for a few days, until today when she picked me up from the library and told me we had to go to the class tonight. and i finally was brave enough to ask if i really, truly HAD to get confirmed and shouldn't it be my choice? she said yes i did, and no it wasn't my choice. so.. i shut up. so then we get to the class, and i lost count of how many times they stressed that it's THE TEENAGER'S CHOICE! so i'm sitting there pissed, not even looking at my mom, thinking.. i effing told you soooo! ugh. so then at the end they asked for people to sign up to either help with a mass, a halloween dance, or both. and so my mom asks which one i want to do or if i want to do both. and i said i dont even want to do this class. so she gets the angriest i've seen her in a while and gets up and storms out. she said something nasty on the way to the car, but i didnt hear her. i said i was sorry she was upset, but it's MY CHOICE! why would i want to do that if it means absolutely nothing to me?? so ok, she's wicked pissed so i decide to mope around and leave her alone till she gets over it. i go to take a shower and 2 seconds after i get in, she comes in and is like, i'm going out. i asked her where, and she just said OUT! so i start bawling as soon as the door slams and i can't stop for like, 15 minutes. and like i said, i tried to call Allison but she didnt answer and i left her a message that will prolly scare her. sorry. and neither of Alysha's cells seem to be working and i'm afraid to call her house. ahh i think she's home. someone call me because i need a friend and because you love me :D

there's another concert this Friday at the Wolcott VFW again. i dunno if i'm gonna go. Shelly and Angela might. but.. meh.. i'm going to the Apple Festival in Southington on Saturday or Sunday, & i only have $20 so i want to save all my money for that lol. which brings me to my question.. Anyone want to come with me to the Apple Festival? it's gonna be fuunnnnn! apple.. things.. and such! lol and rides and cool booths and apple fritters and bands [which usually aren't that great but yeah]. so anyways, SOMEONE COME WITH ME! please? because you love meeeeeeeee lol. *woot* WAMS SPIRIT!! ::dances:: XD yeah.. today was Unity Day at my school. it was alright. lots of dancing and singing and acting and instrument playing and stuff. a couple kids tried to play "Stairway to Heaven" and kinda well.. killed it a little, and me as well.. i think i died a little inside hearing such a classic being butchered like that. but ok i'm being really mean. because i really couldn't have done any better AT ALL. i can't sing and i don't even remember one chord on the guitar. so it took major guts for them to go up there and do that.. for all the kids to go up there and perform. and i hate the music almost more than anything, but i have to admit that hip-hop dancing stuff is kinda cool. i sure as fuck can't move like that. lol i wish i could dance. jumping around like an idiot is fun, but doesn't exactly count as dancing. oh well. hah, my english teacher told me today that he thinks i should consider switching to the AP class. that made me pee a little in my pants because i laughed so hard. a funny man, that Mr. Northrop.. funny man indeed. i'd have to be in Ms. Park's class again.. and we all know how wonderfully i did in english in her class last year.. gosh. i'm just not cut out for AP courses, i'm too lazy. and think of how much shit i would have to make up that i missed. ewww.. i barely have to do anything in school lol and i'm stressed enough. no fucking AP english with Ms. Park who makes you find symbolism in a comma for me, but thanks very much for your amazing vote of confidence. i'll be staying in Northrop's class, definitely. it's honors, so that's good enough for me.

i've been reading so much SBP today.. im going to go blind from staring at the screen for countless hours. geez. but's awesome and i'm addicted but i have to get off this fucking computer before i stay on until 3am reading all the way to fucking part 23.. yeah im only on 14.. EW. and no one knows or cares what the fuck i'm talking about, but that's alright. well Ami and Kelly finally know and i'm glad lol.. but i have to admit it was fun as hell to bug them tee hee. hey i just realized im a total space cadet and a complete LOSER lol.. well, my friends.. how was your first day of school [Christian and Aneta]?? mine wasn't too bad. the only things that kind of sucked were that Kelly and i didn't get our photography classes, but we whined to Kirshner lol and she and Mrs. D'Angelo are gonna try to fix that for us. and i still only have homeroom with Ami! meh.. not cool. so, biatches.. i'm home... i got to JFK around 4:30 and got to my house around 7:something. the air is so clear and light in CO and its not humid at all, so when i landed in NY and went outside after i got my bags, damn.. i felt like i was freakin under water or some shit.. eww. it's like so, heavy and dense here DX i don't really know if i'm happy to be home or not o_o i kind of have mixed feelings. but i'm going back to see Sai Maa in December, and Premananda [one of the monks who lives at the Ashram] said that there's going to be another youth program next summer, so i guess it's all good. i miss everyone! we didn't get to say goodbye yesterday [or today cuz we left at frikin 5:00 am].. we went over to the Ashram to go to meditation and Arti, but there was NO ONE around. we were like, where the hell did everyone go?! so we get home and see that we have a message. who was it? Premananda telling us that everyone went to Salida [a town about 45 minutes away] to a movie and dinner. DAMN! lol so we didnt get to say goodbye to anyone, i'm so sad. but hopefully i'll see a lot of people when i go back in December. i really hope you can go Aneta, i want you to so bad lol. and once i show you the pics, you'll REALLY want to go.. though, of course, in December everything will be snow-covered, but it'll prolly be even more beautiful. and since we didn't get to this time, we're prolly gonna go to Colorado Springs next time, so we can see the town i was born in. so that should be cool. yup yup. i don't want to go back to school, but i am so looking forward to seeing Ami and Kelly! and.. other people, heh but Ami and Kelly are the only ones at school who really matter lol :P oh and Ami i'm sorry i didn't answer when you called on Friday. i didn't get your message until today because i didn't have any kind of a signal in Crestone, we were out in the middle of frikin nowhere dude. lol.. so you can either call me again or i'll just talk to you on Wednesday, alrighty my friend? hmm, well now i don't think i'm going school shopping tomorrow because i didn't get the money my grandpa said he was sending. but maybe we can do something anyways, Aneta? idk.. im thinking i'll just like pop over to walmart and get like, a five subject notebook and some pens & pencils, so i at least have something for wednesday x_x and maybe we can bounce on over to Applebees or a movie or just wreak havoc in walmart or the mall or something lol i dunno.

i'll be home tomorrow night, guys.. i know you all miss me XD

so i'm definitely coming back [to Crestone] right after Christmas. i totally need a job so i can save up for at least a little bit of the plane ticket, which we need to buy soon Neapy, if you're coming with me. because if we wait too long they're going to get even more expensive. i'm going to try and find the cheapest fare possible, maybe you can help me look. so we need round-trip tix for like, Dec. 26 to Jan. 2 or something. alrighty? ^_^

AMI I MISS YOU! lol

holy hell.. so yesterday was Warped Tour with Ami. it was so crazy!!! first off, the doors opened at 11:00 but Ami didn't even get to my house till 10:something lol. so she picks me up and we start for the concert and we hit traffic at around exit 16, and we need to get off at exit 19.. so i figured, ok it won't be too long and we won't be that late for the concert, maybe an hour or something. uhm.. no lol. 4 hours we sat in that fucking traffic. we got there at 3:00!! i thought i was gonna go crazy in that car. but ppl going by in the cars had funny signs and stuff lol.. like, "honk if you like foreskin" and stuff like that XD we couldn't come up with a good sign, but that's ok. so anyways, we get to the concert at like 3:00 and we've missed Hawthorne Heights, who we both wanted to see, and Atreyu, who Ami wanted to see. so that kind of sucked but, eh. and apparently it rained like a mofo before we got there because the whole place was like one giant mud puddle. it was so hard to walk and i just knew i was going to fall flat on my ass or my face by the end of the day. but i actually didnt lol, though my shoes and pants were filthy, and in the mosh pit Ami got kicked in the face by some idiot crowd surfer and her muddy shoes and got mud everywhere lol. anyways, so we walked around thru the booths and stuff for a while and then decided to go up and watch Story of the Year. we were kind of far away from the stage, but we figured we'd get pushed closer when the idiots started moshing. and we did lol. so when SOTY was over and Fall Out Boy started, we were almost up at the front and i figured by the time MCR came on we'd be up at the rail and just fine. but of course people had to be super STUPID and push Ami and me from every fucking direction and try to squish us to death and then i had to go and get all claustrophobic and dehydrated during "Sugar, We're Going Down" and i had to get pulled out because i started puking all over the fucking place. lmao i actually puked on a few people in front of me.. i'm pretty sure they didn't even notice though XD and people were so tightly packed together and i was so squished in the crowd that it took like 3 guys to pull me out. that and the fact that i'm not the skinniest girl in the world lol. but i finally got out and kept puking up my waffles from that morning. then Ami got pulled out cuz i did and she started having breathing problems so they took her to the medical tent-thingy and i followed ..haha and we passed right in front of the freaking stage so Fall Out Boy was close enough for us to reach out and touch them! i was like.. holy fuck!! Ami and i wanted to pull out our cameras lol but she thought the guy escorting her to the medical tent-thingy might get mad lol and she's prolly right. so i think getting sick was worth it just to be so close to Patrick and Pete, even for a few seconds. so we stayed in the medical area for a while because Ami couldn't breathe and she was hyperventilating and stuff. i was fine by then, i felt better after i puked lol. aw but poor Aimster was just so out of it and shaking and.. god i was really worried. XD but you know that when she was sitting there on the cot, i was standing there watching the rest of Fall Out Boy's set cuz we had a clear view of them from there. i kind of felt bad but.. hey, when will i see them again?? lol. yeah, so we stayed there for a while and saw The Transplants, kind of lol. then Ami felt better so we left the medical area and walked around again thru the booths. we found the MCR booth and she got a tank top and i got a hoodie. *woot* my hoodie is awesome.. i just wish it was cold so i could wear it comfortably lol. so we walked around aimlessly for a while till it was time for MCR. but this time we stayed like, right on the edge of the big crowd. i was not gonna go back in that damn mosh pit, fuck no. people were so fucking crazy and i got so scared ::shiver:: so at first we had a clear view of the stage and it was ok even though we were kind of far away. but then assholes started going in front of us [tell me, why didn't we see that coming??!!] and i swear people were getting taller just to spite us and we couldn't see shit lol. i had to jump up and down just to see the stage and poor Ami is shorter than me so she had an even harder time seeing. but i got a cool pic of Frank and Gerard singing. it's far away and they're really small, but if i make it bigger you can see them lol even tho its a little blurry its ok. and Ami got a couple of really awesome pics of Frank that i want copies of!! they were the last to play, and after the show we went and got posters from the MCR booth cuz we didn't want to carry them around all day cuz we knew they'd get ruined. the posters we got are so awesome, 'specially cuz you can NOT find posters fucking anywhere else!! lol so seeing MCR, even from so far away, was definitely worth all of the craziness of the day. they're going on a headlining tour with Alkaline Trio and Reggie and the Full Effect. they're coming to Hartford on Sunday, October 16th. presale tix are only $20!! though, with online fees and shipping and stuff its about $25, but that's still fucking cool as hell. dunno if i can get a presale ticket, i hope so. i know its a sunday and i have school the next day, but i don't care! i am going! though, it says general admission, so that makes me think its like the Webster Theater and there's no seats and i'd have to be in another mosh pit XD i dunno.. i don't think it'd be as crazy as yesterday at Warped. so i'm going. i'll buy my own ticket, even if i can't get presale. i gotta tell Ami and maybe she can come with me. i dont really want to go alone, and i'm sure she'd be pissed if i went without her lol cuz i know i would be. soooo.. yes lol. :D my mom has a friend who has a online CD store thingy.. she's gonna ask him to get me Take This To Your Grave and From Under The Cork Tree by Fall Out Boy. i downloaded From Under The Cork Tree but i like to have the actual, real CD and my version of "Dance, Dance" sucks and one of the songs is not what the title says it is lol. and i can't find out what song it is! it def. sounds like Fall Out Boy, i know its Fall Out Boy, but yeah i cant find that song anywhere so idk what its really called. mmm hmm.. ^_^ i got to hang out with Christian today. HAPPY 16TH BIRTHDAY!! we went to this restaurant in Southington, Sam the Clam's lol it was pretty cool. i'd never even heard of it before. i liked it. i got fish and chips.. mmm.. and all i could think of was Trainspotting lol. yeah if you've seen that movie then you prolly know what i'm talking about and if you haven't, then ..yeah lol. after lunch we were supposed to go mini golfing but of course it had to freaking rain! so then we just went back to Christian's house and played Clue on the computer [haha, that was so awesome, i want it!] and called Aneta but got disconnected :/ and then we took a walk.. and then we watched tv and i got my ass beat at video games [i mean it Christian, if we had been playing Tekken, i would have kicked your ASS, BIATCH!!]. and then we played Scopa. and then.. hah, his dad came downstairs and was like "come on guys, come have some snacks." and we're like ok, just a sec cuz we were almost done with the game.. and his dad was like, "uh, no.. i think right now." and we're like.. whoaaa, ooook lol. so we go up and they start singing Happy Birthday. but they had a pumpkin pie instead of a cake because they have this thing where if his birthday falls on a weekday then they have pumpkin pie instead of a cake. thought that was a cool little tradition. and i looooove pumpkin pie lol. then we walked over to his neighbor's house and talked to her for a little while and then went back and played more Scopa while watching some nonsense on TV lol and then i had to go home and pack and i finished packing and here i am at the computer lol. yup, so this will prolly be my last entry for about 2 weeks, 12 days to be exact. i'm leaving for CO tomorrow morning, and i dunno if i'll have internet access while i'm out there. hardly anyone reads this mess, so it's alright lol. lata playas XD ... i dunno ♥

weee! i'm finally home! even though i'm leaving again on wednesday lol. and i won't be home all day tomorrow or tuesday. but that's ok lol.. i'm just glad to not be at my dad's anymore. spending a week there was just too much. Leah is the only reason to go up there often.. but even so, i don't plan on going back soon. i've had all i can take for a while lol. i did have some fun times this week though. like yesterday we went to the Renaissance Faire up in NY. the only things that made it suck were the heat and the boys were complaining and asking for stuff all fucking day. it was so annoying, i wanted to strangle them. and Frank, Marji, and Danielle were supposed to come, but Marji caught a cold. it would have been so much more fun if they had come. oh well. i wish it didn't cost so much to get in, i want to go back lol. well i'm hopefully getting a job soon. i'll save up for a good costume and go back next year. i want to go with my friends one time. that would rock. oh and Aneta, i had a pickle for you lol. i bought it from this guy who looked like Bam Margera haha. and i got a corset yesterday too. it's absolutely gorgeous. it's silver with a black skulls and flames pattern on it. i should take a pic and post it. and i will. which reminds me, i need to charge my camera tonight so i can use it tomorrow.. cause tomorrow is WARPED TOUR!! i am soooooooooooo frikin excited, holy crap. dunno if i'll be able to sleep tonight lol. and i forgot to get sunscreen. oh well. ok i'm going to go take a picture of my corset now.... [15 minutes later] ok i took a pic of the and a yup yup. purty, isn't it? i didn't even have to pay for it haha. i had more than enough money for it, but Tara was with me when i picked it out and she used her AmEx card to get it, which was super nice of her. i saw it and immediately knew that that was what i wanted. i didn't see anything else i wanted, which i found surprising. i went to the faire looking for a pirate hat and boots. i found some, but everything was leather! and i will not wear leather. i feel bad enough that my favorite wallet is leather lol. so i didn't buy a hat or boots :/ i'll have to come up with something else for halloween i guess. or maybe i can find a hat at the halloween costume shop. and i can just wear my crazily-uncomfortable-yet-awesomely-awesome boots lol. and i need a better skirt to go with the corset too if i want to be a pirate. hmm well i have a while yet to find something. ANYWAYS.. Warped Tour is tomorrow! with my Aimster! i cannot wait to see MCR!!! i'm gonna die lol. i wanna see Hawthorne Heights and Fall Out Boy too. Fall Out Boy has become one of my favorites. their latest album, "From Under The Cork Tree", is flippin' sweet. Hawthorne Heights' album is awesome too.. im listening to it now. *woot* well i should prolly go to bed now. it's like 11:something and i missed the Andy Milonakis Show [damn it!] and i have to get up kind of early tomorrow. Ami's not coming to pick me up till after 10:00, but that's early for me!! lol nighty night ♥

yes so.. i have been here in torrington at my dad's since saturday night. i can't take much more of this lol. i'm not leaving till sunday after church. i dont even want to go to church! ugh.. oh well. but yesterday was super fun. we went to Burr Pond across town and went swimming and canoeing and stuff. i spent pretty much all day in the water playing with Seth and Caleb. it was awesome at times.. and then you know of course they got on my nerves. just a wee bit lol. but over all the day was good. and then today we went to a cartoon museum in Cheshire. it was flippin' sweet. it wasn't exactly what i had expected it to be, it wasnt like a regular museum. it was this man and his wife's private collection of all kinds of memorabilia. they have stuff ranging from around the 20's and maybe before up to today. and you know how they make those lunch boxes with like all the characters and stuff on them? and how popular they used to be. i guess they aren't so popular anymore.. but anyways.. they have thousands of them. the tour guide said that they're only like 20 short of a full set. and they just have SO MANY THINGS! you could go there 10 times and still not see everything. it was so cool. haha and then we went to Ikea, and i finally got to spend my giftcard that i got for my birthday back in January! it's now August and i only just spent it lol. but i got the comforter that i wanted.. YES! and i had some left over money and there was nothing else that i wanted for $10 or less [cuz thats all i had left], so i got this mirror for my mom that she saw in the catalog and wanted really badly. so.. *woot* happy liz :D so uhmm.. tomorrow we're not doing anything cuz Seth has a counseling appointment ['bout time they got that boy some help] and then there's some roofer guy coming because, well.. the roof needs to be fixed lol. but friday i think we're going to Essex for some train thing and a steam boat thing and some castle thing lol. so that should be interesting. and then saturday we're going to the Renaissance Faire.. yesssss! highlight of the week, definitely. i cant wait.

right well, i finally talked to Alysha. i called her sunday night but she didnt answer so i left a message. she called me back a little while later. so now she's staying in Florida. i have mixed feelings about it that i'm really not going to get into right now. but you would think something that big, something that important.. she might have called the person who is supposedly her best friend, but i dunno.. that's just me i guess. geez. so when she called back i was in the car and it was too loud to hear, so i said i'd call her back when i got home and i did, but she didnt answer lol and i left a message.. but she never called me back again. so i dunno. she's going back to school soon, if she hasn't already. and apparently she's got a job.. i dunno.. i guess so because she said something about how she was working or something. hmm, well.. if she wants to call me back she will. i won't bother her again.
